analysis.description:
etherdoodleToken.processMultiPurchase (/unique_chucks/20/0xcf438fb35c4c7131e8846e4ccb5bec3ea60d7591.sol#483-516) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _oldOwner.transfer(payment) (/unique_chucks/20/0xcf438fb35c4c7131e8846e4ccb5bec3ea60d7591.sol#515)
AddressUtils.isContract (/unique_chucks/20/0xcf438fb35c4c7131e8846e4ccb5bec3ea60d7591.sol#60-76) is declared view but contains assembly code

ERC721 (/unique_chucks/20/0xcf438fb35c4c7131e8846e4ccb5bec3ea60d7591.sol#81-122) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (/unique_chucks/20/0xcf438fb35c4c7131e8846e4ccb5bec3ea60d7591.sol#101-103)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/20/0xcf438fb35c4c7131e8846e4ccb5bec3ea60d7591.sol#108-111)

etherdoodleToken (/unique_chucks/20/0xcf438fb35c4c7131e8846e4ccb5bec3ea60d7591.sol#153-743) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (/unique_chucks/20/0xcf438fb35c4c7131e8846e4ccb5bec3ea60d7591.sol#296-309)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/20/0xcf438fb35c4c7131e8846e4ccb5bec3ea60d7591.sol#371-376)
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/20/0xcf438fb35c4c7131e8846e4ccb5bec3ea60d7591.sol#389-393)
payment in etherdoodleToken.processMultiPurchase (/unique_chucks/20/0xcf438fb35c4c7131e8846e4ccb5bec3ea60d7591.sol#487-488) is a local variable never initialiazed

etherdoodleToken.multiPurchase has external calls inside a loop:
	- msg.sender.transfer(excessValue) (/unique_chucks/20/0xcf438fb35c4c7131e8846e4ccb5bec3ea60d7591.sol#481)

AddressUtils.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/20/0xcf438fb35c4c7131e8846e4ccb5bec3ea60d7591.sol#60-76)
	- /unique_chucks/20/0xcf438fb35c4c7131e8846e4ccb5bec3ea60d7591.sol#74-75
ERC721.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/20/0xcf438fb35c4c7131e8846e4ccb5bec3ea60d7591.sol#96-97) should be declared external
etherdoodleToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/20/0xcf438fb35c4c7131e8846e4ccb5bec3ea60d7591.sol#342-343) should be declared external
